creator: s.gianni@thebug.it
text:
When the server is configured with a store that does not support binding, or 
the binding is configured to be false, it should report an error, and not a 
201 Created message.

The problem seems to be caused by the structure.addBinding call in BindMethod
(implemented in SZtructureImpl) that checks if the binding is enabled, and if 
it's not simply returns, without any kind of error code.

Thus, the method has no chance of changing it's status to 501 Unimplemented, 
and returns a 201 Created.

A possible solution would be to add an else in the condition check, and throw 
an exception in it, which could be catched by the method.

Unfortunately i'm not yet quite used to slide code to produce a patch for 
this, since i don't know what impact this change would have on other parts of 
the code.

Ciao,
Simone Gianni
